ai-pp2.7:1.1_0: And what kind of person sinks under once and stays under?
ai-pp2.7:1.2_0: It’s when someone has extra unskillful qualities.
ai-pp2.7:1.3_0: This person sinks under once and stays under.
ai-pp2.7:2.1_0: And what kind of person rises up then sinks under?
ai-pp2.7:2.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:2.3_0: However their faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom don’t last or grow, but dwindle away.
ai-pp2.7:2.4_0: This kind of person rises up then sinks under.
ai-pp2.7:3.1_0: And what kind of person rises up then stays put?
ai-pp2.7:3.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:3.3_0: And their faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom don’t last or grow, but dwindle away.
ai-pp2.7:3.4_0: This kind of person rises up then stays put.
ai-pp2.7:4.1_0: And what kind of person rises up then sees and discerns?
ai-pp2.7:4.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:4.3_0: With the ending of three fetters they’re a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
ai-pp2.7:4.4_0: then a person rises up then sees and discerns.
ai-pp2.7:5.1_0: And what kind of person rises up then crosses over?
ai-pp2.7:5.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:5.3_0: With the ending of three fetters, and the weakening of greed, hate, and delusion, they’re a once-returner. They come back to this world once only, then make an end of suffering.
ai-pp2.7:5.4_0: so a person rises up then crosses over.
ai-pp2.7:6.1_0: And what kind of person rises up then finds a footing?
ai-pp2.7:6.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:6.3_0: With the ending of the five lower fetters they’re reborn spontaneously. They are extinguished there, and are not liable to return from that world.
ai-pp2.7:6.4_0: This kind of person rises up then finds a footing.
ai-pp2.7:7.1_0: And what kind of person has risen up, crossed over, and gone beyond, a brahmin who stands on the shore?
ai-pp2.7:7.2_0: It’s the kind of person who, rising up, thinks: “It’s good to have conscience and prudence in skillful qualities. It’s good to develop the skillful qualities.”
ai-pp2.7:7.3_0: They’ve realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.7:7.4_0: A person has risen up, crossed over, and gone beyond, a brahmin who stands on the shore.
ai-pp2.7:8.1_0: And what person is freed both ways?
ai-pp2.7:8.2_0: It’s someone who has direct meditative experience of the eight liberations. And, having seen with wisdom, their defilements come to an end.
ai-pp2.7:8.3_0: This person is called freed both ways.
ai-pp2.7:9.1_0: And what person is freed by wisdom? ...
ai-pp2.7:13.1_0: or a follower of the teachings,
ai-pp2.7:14.1_0: And what person is a follower of faith?
ai-pp2.7:14.2_0: For someone who has faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom; who develops the noble path with faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.7:14.3_0: This person is called a follower of faith.
ai-pp2.7:14.4_0: They’re freed in the fruit of stream-entry, and someone who is freed by faith.
